TheLibrarian:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

TheLibrarian:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
TheLibrarian:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

TheLibrarian:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

TheLibrarian:TheInvitation.NAME: The Invitation
TheLibrarian:TheInvitation.FLAVOR:
Dear Guest: I formally invite you to the library.
The Library's books can provide you with all the wisdom, wealth, honor, and power you seek.
However, an ordeal will await you in the library.
If you cannot overcome this ordeal, you will be converted into a book yourself.?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #yEmptyBook into your hand.

TheLibrarian:WCorpBattery.NAME: W Corp Battery
TheLibrarian:WCorpBattery.FLAVOR: As a matter of fact, the alley is an open one.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 [E]. Lose #b1 [E] for each time you've exhausted your draw pile.
